Place the Kaggle ESPN draft dataset CSV files in this folder.

Expected filenames:
- nfl_draft_prospects.csv
- nfl_draft_profiles.csv
- college_qbr.csv
- college_stats.csv (or college_statistics.csv)
- ids.csv

Source:
https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jacklichtenstein/espn-nfl-draft-prospect-data

This project only ingests useful modeling fields and ignores non-essential metadata.
